name: Game Exit V 2.0
description:
One day a magician accidentally fell into a dungeon and has to find a way out of it.

Left mouse button - apply magic.

The right mouse button is a zipper.

The middle mouse button is invulnerability.

Mouse scrolling is the choice of magic.

Arrows - movement.

The game has fifteen levels with increasing difficulty from simple to complex.

Five enemies of different appearance and behavior, as well as a difficult boss.

The hero has seven types of magic for a different amount of mana.

Random drop of items from enemies and chests, including mana and life.

Random appearance of enemies from chests and not only from them.

Thus, a lot of randomness is obtained, which increases the level of complexity.

Complex mazes, dangerous traps, teleports, four types of keys and locks. complex environment - rocks, stalagmites, lava, bonfires, water, quicksand, skulls and two types of chests. 

Be careful in your actions, any action may be the last! 

Auto save the game when completing a level.

Forty-three random dungeon images between levels.

Dynamic music.
